tool_description: Countries' data—name, flag (form Twitter icons), ISO-codes, etc
name: Rest Countries
title: Rest Countries

api_list.name: Get Countries
api_list.description:
returns all the currently available countries.  Every item includes the following parameters: 
- Short name
- Short name lowcase
- Full name
- ISO alpha-2-code
- ISO alpha-3-code
- ISO numeric 3-digit code
- Flag (from Twitter emojis)
- Official flag —only for those countries which have an unnoficial flag
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rest-countries10.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rest-countries10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rest-countries10.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rest-countries10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
